body.name: Over The Sink Dish Drying Rack - 2 Tier Stainless Steel Over The Sink Dish Rack with Sink Caddy, Utensil & Cutting Board Holder - Kitchen Counter Space Saver
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 16 hrs 1 min
features: 3-TIER MULTIFUNCTIONAL DISH DRAINER: ECOMERR'S over sink dish drying rack keeps all dishware and utensils clean and in place. Our sink shelf comes with 1 Cup Holder, 2 Utensil Holders, 1 Cutting Board Holder,1 Knife Holder and 5 Utility Hooks. Use our dish drying rack over the sink or on the counter to save space and time by making it simpler to organize utensils, dishes, and other kitchen items.

RUSTPROOF AND DURABLE: This sink dish rack is composed of high-quality stainless steel, which is corrosion-resistant, scratch-resistant and rust-resistant. The rectangular construction at the top is more sturdy, capable of carrying 60 pounds while remaining steady and without tipping forward. Two rubber suction cups on the bottom keep the dish rack from wiggle-waggle across the tabletop, isolating it from the water and protecting the countertop without leaving traces.

ADJUSTABLE LENGTH: Freely modify the length of rack (From 25.6" to 37.4" inches): This dish drainer over sink use equipped short screws to lock the width of middle square tube. Outside Dimensions of shelf:(25.6" to 37.4" inches), Inside Dimensions of shelf: (24.8"-36.6"inches). The faucet height should be ≤ 16.9 inches, and the height from the bottom of the cabinet to the countertop should be ≥ 19.6 inches.

EASY ASSEMBLY AND CLEANING: Using our how-to-install instructions or videos, you can quickly assemble the dish strainer in minutes using screws and a wrench without the use of any additional equipment. Each sink dish rack is outfitted with 4 bolts. Furthermore, the cleaning is quite easy because all attachments can be easily detached. Just wipe them with a damp towel.

SPACE SAVER: This multi-purpose dishwasher rack can organize utensils, knives, forks, plates, bowls, sponges, cutting boards, cups and other kitchen supplies all in one storage system efficiently saving your Countertop space. Please carefully measure Height of the faucet, and the height between the cabinet bottom to the countertop before buying. Kindly Contact us in case of any queries.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Automatic drain system promotes better hygiene and optimizes space. This feature directs water away from the dishes and into a designated drainage area, preventing excess water from pooling and damaging dishes or countertops. The system is hands-free and eliminates the need for users to manually drain excess water from their dishes, saving time and effort. This large capacity dish rack is an ideal solution for those who frequently wash a lot of dishes or have a large family. These dish racks are designed to accommodate a larger number of dishes, glasses, and utensils than standard dish racks, which can help make the dishwashing process more efficient and less time-consuming. With more space, users can wash and dry all their dishes at once, rather than having to wait for multiple rounds. This is made up of Stainless steel that is a strong and sturdy material and is resistant to rust, corrosion, and stains, making it a reliable choice for a dish rack. This material can withstand the weight and volume of dishes without warping or bending, ensuring that the dish rack remains stable and functional over time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The item is solid construction, holds weight well, doesn't rock or sway. Attachments are movable and allows for personal taste. The shelves are well designed and easily accessed. I had reservations at ordering, but it fits my limited counter space dilemma perfectly. Color me pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together. Sturdy and TALL. Fits perfectly over my sink saving space on the counter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really loved this product. It is sturdy and looks really nice and very easy to assemble. Only problem was I was not able fit it over my sink because I can’t adjust the size of it since it was only one size and not adjustable. overall it’s good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Father's Day Gift
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I bought this for my dad for Father's Day. He was using a small dish rack with kitchen towels . He saw mine and fell in love with it, so fi out him one too. He loves it! It's out of the way. It increases cabinet space, and was easy to assemble. If you don't have one I suggest you get one. It's absolutely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great and love having more counter space. It's kinda an eyesore in the kitchen, but I'm still giving it 5 stars. The instructions are awful, but after looking at it for a few minutes it's easy to put together.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Major piece of crap and waste of money
reviews.reviewText: Says it is adjustable, it is NOT ADJUSTABLE. Came broke and bent. Also paint is chipped and scratched off in multiple spots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and sturdy!
reviews.reviewText: I thought the width was adjustable, but it isn't. Maybe I read it wrong, so I'm not taking stars away for that. Regardless, I hit the lottery on this rack; it fits my sink (exactly 33 inches wide) so perfectly, it's like the engineers came to my house and took measurements with space age instruments! The assembly directions are a joke, but it's very easy to see how it all goes together. I had mine assembled in about 30 minutes, and I'm an old lady with arthritis. I was worried about purchasing this, as I have never had one before, but it's one of the best things I've ever bought through Amazon. I absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not adjustable or painted very well
reviews.reviewText: It is NOT adjustable despite what the description states. Just putting it together, the paint was coming off (you can see the silver coming through on the pictures). The only positive is the size. Would not buy again.
